Workshops and Events

The AI Clinic hosts periodic workshops on topics related to its mission of making general-purpose AI more transparent and approachable. We also invite members of the community to participate in many of our events. Please check back often for updates.

LLM Confidence Workshop

April 5, 2025, 6pm PST
Mary Gates Hall 015H

LLMs usually answer users confidently, but should they? Join us to learn about methods for estimating the confidence of LLMs.

LLM Experiment Workshop

March 2, 2025, 6pm PST
Mary Gates Hall 015H

LLMs are common in research - but do we use them reliably? Join us to learn about best practices for experiments with LLMs.

About The AI Clinic

The AI Clinic is an initiative of the UW iSchool to make language models more approachable in research.

Dr. Bill Howe: billhowe@uw.edu
